    Striketober

    04 Nov 2021

    Guest host Gabriel Winant interviews labor journalists Alex Press and Jonah Furman, as well as IATSE member Victor P. Bouzi.

    Listen to Primer, Alex’s podcast about Amazon patreon.com/primerpodcast Listen to Victor’s podcast WAIT, Why Am I Talking? podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/wait-why-am-i-talking/id1515308564
